org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl

Class WaitForClusterResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl.WaitForClusterResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationFrameworkMessageConsumer

    public class WaitForClusterResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationFrameworkMessageConsumer
    This class register itself as ApplicationFrameworkMessageConsumer to the given ApplicationFrameworkMessageProducer
    and it wait for a matching AF_INCOMING_MSG. As soon as the matching AF_INCOMING_MSG
    is received or the timeout expires the the object unregister itself from ApplicationFrameworkMessageProducer
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

      • getResponse

        public AF_INCOMING_MSG getResponse()
        Wait until an AF_INCOMING_MSG arrives from the ZigBee Network. The message
        has to match the specified parameters and has to arrive before a timout otherwise null
        will be returned.
        Returns:
        AF_INCOMING_MSG that match the filter used with the constructor
        #WaitForClusterResponse(byte, short)
